extendedInfo.description: Use CanWeNetwork to build a better, stronger, more successful global business network now!Wall St Journal, the Washington Post & LA Times are all buzzing about this business networking app. CanWeNetwork is the only business networking tool you need. Using a powerful machine learning engine, CanWeNetwork recommends people nearby who you should meet for professional networking & business opportunities by incorporating your LinkedIn profile & geo-spatial technologies. FEATURES: Â» MATCHES: CanWeNetwork provides users with valuable professional recommendations of people that they should meet to discover business opportunities. Recommendations are based on location, skill set, experience, shared interests and personality traits extracted from LinkedIn profiles. Â» CONNECT: Invite your matches to meet for coffee. Send them a personal intro about yourself and why you'd like to meet. Once they accept, you're free to chat and arrange a meeting time. Â» LISTS: Not ready to connect with a Match but want to save them for later? Add them to a custom List. Organize your Matches into their own categories that you define. Â» MESSAGE: Once connected, you and your Match can communicate ideas, plans, and schedules using our in-app Message Center. CanWeNetwork requires a LinkedIn user profile with more social networks coming soon!

reviews.title: Great app... landed an internship
reviews.comment: I have definitely met some interesting people that I normally would have passed by and one of the connections turned into a summer internship
reviews.author: Nick Braswell

reviews.title: Nice idea BUT
reviews.comment: This is a nice idea but the algorithm needs a little more weighting to find more relevant matches. Over the past few weeks I have tried this and even up to 78% matches leave me wondering why it was so high. I would have thought proximity, industry and skills come first, but sometimes I am left thinking the pool of matching variables must be petty small as relevance is exceptionally low! I will give it a bit more chance but searching in LinkedIn alone gives more relevant results.
reviews.author: Andrew Gavin

reviews.title: Really really fascinating concept
reviews.comment: I really love the concept behind this app and if you are trying to network proximity is important.  I have been using this app everyday since I learned of it 2 weeks ago.  It is uncanny how it has helped me seperate the wheat from the chaff and allows me to find VERY interesting people to network with.  The first day I used the app, I met a guy at the table next to me that was a computer geek just like me!.    As with any social network this will get better once more people use this app.
reviews.author: Eric Stallsmith

reviews.title: Nearly perfect
reviews.comment: Need more related profile to network, although good start.
reviews.author: Gaurav Bhavsar

reviews.title: Looks nice
reviews.comment: Seems like a new way to connect, but I have to give this more time before providing more details. For now looks okay
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Impressive!
reviews.comment: Within minutes there are professionals to connect with. This is not your typical social network, this is the new office.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: It\'s like magic
reviews.comment: I don\'t know how it finds so many cool people near me.  Just installed it but it looks cool already.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Brilliant!
reviews.comment: Very well-done app! Snappy and looks great on my Galaxy Nexus!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Get off my battery
reviews.comment: This app runs my battery down by continuing to search for my location even if I\'m logged out, AND I force close.   There is also NO setting to turn this feature off.  Annoying.  Uninstall.
reviews.author: Dapp Ollone

reviews.title: Good Start
reviews.comment: Like the concept. The matching is decent. Needs more users.  Had trouble with the linkedin login at first but that seems to have gone away.  Can\'t wait to see where it goes from here.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Why wasn\'t this around years ago?!
reviews.comment: This app is incredible, has a great interface, and is responsible for helping me find my business partner and staff for my music and entertainment company (Bleu Moon Presents). Excellent job! I can\'t wait for more Canwe products.!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: More login methods
reviews.comment: I don\'t have a linked in account, I\'m not getting one just for this app
reviews.author: Paulina Cabello

reviews.comment: no way Im going to spam linkedin contacts
reviews.author: Oren Zvi
